content.title: 100 Discord OG's
content.text: First 100 members of our Discord server recieves an OG role, with access to future giveaways and more!

content.title: Holder Discord role
content.text: Anyone who holds a Trauma Llama will get access to custom Discord channels where we will hold future giveaways for Llama holders

content.title: Llama Merch
content.text: We will open a public merch store for anyone to purchase desired wearables

content.title: Gen 2 Mobile Game
content.text: Together with the Gen 2 NFT drop, we will plan development of a mobile game where you can play as a Gen 1 or Gen 2 Trauma Llama
